titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1998, certain previously existing temporary duty suspensions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 7/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1997, the suspension of duty on: (1) 2-ethylanthraquinone; (2) rhodamine 2C base; (3) acid black 210 powder and presscake; (4) pigment red 178; (5) pigment red 149 dry and pigment red 149 presscake; and (6) isoindolemine red pigment.
